title: Vivaldi - Orlando Furioso - Baroque Opera
description:
Orlando Furioso, RV 728
Dramma per musica in tre atti - Opera in Three Acts

Composer:  Antonio Vivaldi
Libretto:  Grazio Braccioli
First performance:  Teatro San Angelo, Venezia, autumn, 1727
Fondo Giordano 39 bis della Biblioteca Nazionale Universitaria di Torino
Edizione critica di Federico Maria Sardelli / Istituto Italiano Antonio Vivaldi della Fondazione Giorgio Cini di Venezia.
Ricostruzione di Frederic Delamea e Jean-Christophe Spinosi

Choeur "Les Elements"
Ensemble Matheus

Marie-Nicole Lemieux, Orlando  (contralto)
Jennifer Larmore, Alcina (mezzo-soprano )
Veronica Cangemi, Angelica (soprano)
Philippe Jaroussky, Ruggiero (contro-tenore)
Lorenzo Regazzo, Astolfo (baritono-basso)
Ann Hallenberg, Bradamante (mezzo-soprano)
Blandine Staskiewicz, Medoro (mezzo-soprano)

Joel Suhubiette, maestro del coro
Jean-Christophe Spinosi, conductor
 
Label:  Opus 111/Naive
Total time: 182:34
Rip:  mp3 @ 320 kbps

The opera takes place on the sorceress Alcina&#039;s enchanted island. Although old and ugly, Alcina has the magical power to make herself appear beautiful and to bewitch courtiers who set foot in her realm. She has tried to make her power eternal by gaining possession of the invincible guard Arontes under the statue of the wizard in the Temple of Infernal Hecate.

Brought to the island by fate, the other main characters of the opera, namely the beautiful Angelica, her young Saracen lover, Medoro, and the jealous Orlando - a Christian knight and Charlemagne&#039;s nephew, who is in love with Angelica - are entwined in an intriguing love story of furious passion and despair.
